content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • Contract 823 involved the construction and completion of stations at Mountbatten, Dakota and Paya Lebar including tunnels; while Contract 828 covered the architectural works of the Stadium and Nicholl Highway Stations.
  • The Circle Line (CCL) is a significant part of Singapore’s growing rail system which was built in various stages to provide greater connectivity for commuters, optimizing travelling time by bypassing the city.
CLIENT

Land Transport Authority

LOCATION

Stadium, Paya Lebar, Nicholl Highway, Mountbatten and Dakota Stations

COMPLETION YEAR

2009

AWARDS
  • BCA Construction Excellence Award, Civil Engineering Projects Category, 2011
